demos.name: Mapping
demos.description:
Mapping Demos

The Mapping Toolbox is a collection of MATLAB functions for display, manipulation and creation of geographic data.

The Mapping Toolbox allows you to plot geographic data as easily as X-Y data. Both vector and matrix map data can be layered using one of 60 different projections. The toolbox provides functions for a wide variety of geographic and navigational calculations. It allows statistical analysis to account for the curvature of the Earth. Almanac functions provide spherical and elipsoidal representations of the Earth and other planets.

The Mapping Toolbox includes many convenient GUIs that allow interactive control over map appearance and content. External interface functions allow the use of detailed map data available from government sources over the Internet or on CD-ROM.
